payment_confirmed_welcome.subject: Welcome to FASE
payment_confirmed_welcome.congratulations: We're pleased to welcome you to FASE. Your membership for {organizationName} is now active.
payment_confirmed_welcome.congratulations_m: We're pleased to welcome you to FASE. Your membership for {organizationName} is now active.
payment_confirmed_welcome.congratulations_f: We're pleased to welcome you to FASE. Your membership for {organizationName} is now active.
payment_confirmed_welcome.portal_description: Your member portal is now ready. Here you can showcase your company with a professional profile, download FASE branding materials for your own marketing, and explore the full range of member benefits available to you.
payment_confirmed_welcome.logo_info: As a FASE member, you are entitled to display the FASE logo on your websites and marketing materials. You can download both horizontal and vertical logo versions from your portal. To be featured in our member directory, please send your company logo and a brief business summary (max 500 characters) to admin@fasemga.com.
payment_confirmed_welcome.support: If you need any assistance getting started, our team is here to help.

member_portal_welcome.subject: Welcome to FASE - your member portal access
member_portal_welcome.welcome_intro: Welcome to FASE, the pan-European MGA federation. We're delighted to have {organizationName} as a founder member.
member_portal_welcome.portal_access: You can access our member portal here. In the coming weeks, we will continue to release, through the portal, new tools and data resources to support the growth of your business in Europe.
member_portal_welcome.member_directory: Next month we will be publishing the first iteration of FASE's member directory. You can use the portal to share relevant details of {organizationName} that you would like to share with other members through the portal and with the broader market through our website.
member_portal_welcome.closing: Please do not hesitate to reach out if you have any questions.
